priceHistory.source: Allen Tate Realtors, formerly Rigby Co.

attributeSource.infoString2: Allen Tate Realtors, formerly Rigby Co.

data.description: This beautiful waterfront home is located in the magnificent Easley subdivision of Middle Creek. The spacious home offers a peaceful setting for entertaining guests, or quiet family time. The kitchen is newly renovated, with granite countertops, new appliances, and plenty of storage. Family room located just off the kitchen provides a cozy fireplace, built-in shelving, and access to the screened porch overviewing the pond. Upstairs has a large master bathroom, on-suite with a walk-in closet and access to the second story balcony. Three more spacious bedrooms are located on the second floor, each with plenty of closet space, and a full bathroom down the hall. A completed walk out basement features a greatroom with a wet bar and second fireplace. In addition, the basement has a full bathroom, laundry room, workout room, and additional storage. This gorgeous home offers a perfect place for today's family. This home is also available for lease at $2,300/month. Call Wade Zebro for your personal showing 864-977-1521 or visit our website at www.convergentpg.com
